text: Join #RSC & @globeandmail for the 1st event of our #COVID19 #Vaccine Series, on Jan 21, experts will explain how new RNA #vaccinations work & why they appear to be so promising. With thx to supporting partners @CIHR_IRSC @NSERC_CRSNG @SSHRC_CRSH Register: https://t.co/nWr7UH73Bu https://t.co/1662ZLGCnn
